lore: These creatures are believed to have been created by the Gods in ancient times, when they began to shape the world. They were probably considered a failed experiment, and were therefore banished beyond the realms of the Gods. The Leech Devourer is a clear example of this. It is technically able to swallow any animal whole, although in a very awkward way. If it manages to do it, however, its digestive system collapses and ends up killing the Leech.
menagerieDialog: (Visions of it sucking the blood from your skull will haunt your nightmares for all eternity.)
(You're horrified to see that fresh blood is dripping from its mouth. Who'd he kill this time?)
(No matter how hard you try, you just can't seem to find any beauty in this creature.)
(This creature's flesh is always lubricated with blood and it smells like copper.)
(It lets out a little burp as it sprays blood all over your boots. Nice.)
name: Leech Devourer
